# Macquaire University School of Mathematical & Physical Sciences \LaTeX Research Report Template

<!-- badges: start -->

<img src="https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/15133161/200966938-ba6f8413-fa77-4ccb-b16d-d7cf14926057.png" align="right" width="150"/>

<!-- badges: end -->

This is a LaTeX class file that can be used in the preparation of a research report with the branding from School of Mathematical & Physical Sciences \@ Macquarie University.

Within this directory you will find,

|                               |                          |
|-------------------------------|--------------------------|
| template.tex                  | The main \LaTeX file     |
| preamble.tex, MQ-logo-col.png | Frontmatter files & Logo |
| references.bib                | Sample BibTeX file       |

The style of the report is heavily inspired by the Monash University Report of Rob Hyndman. You can check out the original `monash` repo here: [link](https://github.com/numbats/monash).
